function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of accurate data on urban forest composition and health","Impact":"Inability to make informed decisions about tree management, leading to potential spread of tree-related diseases","Mitigation":"Conduct regular surveys and monitoring of urban forest health, implement disease management programs","Technologies":"GIS mapping, remote sensing, tree health monitoring devices","People":"Residents, city planners, urban foresters","Owner":"City council, urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate modeling of project impacts","Impact":"Unanticipated negative effects on energy consumption, solar reflectivity, vegetation longevity, and urban resilience","Mitigation":"Use advanced modeling software for comprehensive impact analysis, involve stakeholders in the modeling process","Technologies":"3D visualization tools, urban simulation software, impact assessment platforms","People":"City planners, project developers, community members","Owner":"City council, project developers"},{"Description":"Rapid adoption of 5G model without thorough impact assessment","Impact":"Increased electromagnetic exposure, potential health risks, lack of understanding of long-term effects on residents","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive health impact assessments, involve public health experts in decision-making process, regulate 5G infrastructure placement","Technologies":"Health impact assessment tools, electromagnetic field monitoring devices, public health risk assessment software","People":"Residential communities, public health experts, telecommunications companies","Owner":"Government authorities, public health organizations"}]}
